name: 上海总工会旧址
name_en: The Former Site of Shanghai General Union
address: 上海市黄浦区九江路346号
description: 上海总工会在五卅运动中发挥了重要作用，是工人运动的重要指挥中心，体现了初心与使命的实践。
description_en: The Shanghai General Union played a crucial role in the May 30th Movement as the main command center for the workers' movement, embodying the practice of the original mission.
